Title: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE REMISSION OF THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE PROVINCES OF ABRA, BATAAN, ISABELA, PALAWAN, ROMBLON, AND SURIGAO TO THE PHILIPPINE HEALTH SERVICE.
Data:
[ Act No. 3384, December 03, 1927 ]
AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE REMISSION OF THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE PROVINCES OF ABRA, BATAAN, ISABELA, PALAWAN, ROMBLON, AND SURIGAO TO THE PHILIPPINE HEALTH SERVICE.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The remission of the obligations of the Provinces of Abra, Bataan, Isabela, Palawan, Romblon, and Surigao to the Philippine Health Service amounting to ten thousand nine hundred thirty-one pesos and twenty-four centavos, three thousand one hundred forty-four pesos and thirty-five centavos, seven thousand nine hundred thirtythree pesos and fifty-eight centavos, four thousand three hundred twenty pesos and three centavos, six thousand eighty-one pesos and twenty-five centavos, and seven thou­ sand seven hundred seventy-three pesos and forty centavos, respectively, is hereby authorized.ℒαwρhi৷
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, December 3, 1927.
